channel.title: How To Make Certain Npc's Not Attack At All
channel.description:
Well,
I've Played Alot Of Moparscape Servers In My Time, But For Now I'm Settling Down To Have A Whack At Making, My Own.
On Some Servers I've Seen Npc's Not Attacking Players.
I Was Wondering How Owners Make Their Npc's Do That.
Help Please :|
